```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
plot_data <- read_csv("~/Git/plot-data.csv")
View(plot_data)
```
```{r}
plot_data$SPP <- as.factor(plot_data$SPP)
plot_data$LOC <- as.factor(plot_data$LOC)

ggplot(data = plot_data, mapping = aes(x = SPP, y = NUM)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap(~ LOC, nrow = 1) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) +
  labs(
    x = "Species by Ocean",
    y = "Number of Particles"
  )
```
